alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264 (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 30 at 3:19AM MST until January 01 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM FRIDAY TO 11 AM MST SATURDAY ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 6000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 6000 feet near Dilkon and Shonto. * WHEN...From 5 AM Friday to 11 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute, and any New Year`s Eve travel plans. Snow forecast from 5 AM Friday to 11 AM Saturday: Dilkon 1 to 2 inches Shonto 1 to 3 inches .
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Black Mesa Area; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264
